expected.result1: (foldr (fun x acc -> if x.wer > acc.wer then x else acc) (head tableData) tableData).iteration

paragraph.value: In this experiment we regenerate the phone-marked word lattices between each iteration of extended Baum-Welch. Thus at iteration k+1 we are using pθ(w∣x;κ,Vθk,Rθk) as the model selection criterion when we estimate the parameters θk+1. Starting from the mle, we run extended Baum-Welch 100 times. We observe the following: The logarithm of the approximate MMI criterion, logpθk(w∣x;κ,Vθk,Rθk), reaches its peak value after [REPLACE id="result1" value="?"] iterations and then continues its oscillation.
